episodes.title: Lawsuit claims Dr. Bronner’s fosters risky culture of drug use
episodes.description: In recent decades, Dr. Bronner’s evolved from a niche soap company to a powerhouse brand with a worldwide following. But a wrongful death lawsuit makes some troubling allegations against the Vista-based company. KPBS investigative reporter Scott Rodd says the lawsuit alleges the company has turned a blind eye to an internal culture of drug use.
